name: Reptilian Rising
description: The timeline and everyone in it is under siege! Confront the Reptilian Rising in this 80's tabletop-styled game of squad tactics. Bring retro miniatures to life on battlefields across time. Fight against The Ouroboros through seven time periods, recruit the best of humanity's heroes, and upgrade your favorites for the fight ahead.

name: Eluxia Enigma
description: Eluxia Enigma is a platformer exploration game where you arrive on the planet of Eluxia, a planet riddled with gravitational anomalies. Master the gravity in this platformer with a twisted perspective!

name: Heliotropism
description: From seed to a great tree! Survive the seasons, face crisis and mutate yourself into a tree able to achieve your final form! Grow flowers, mutate, adapt and evolve and finally bear fruits!

name: Reigning
description: A singleplayer, story game where you can make decisions and read your way through history.

name: Selene's Nightmare
description: Face Selene's worst fears in this amazing Horror adventure. Find keys, pass through dark places and travel all the way to wake up.

name: Box and Ball
description: A unique physics-based construction/puzzle game in which you must build a course, avoiding fiendish traps and deadly hazards, to safely guide your BALL into the BOX. Sounds simple? Think again!

name: Flaskoman
description: Flaskoman is a puzzle platformer in a steampunk laboratory. Use mysterious liquids to activate lab mechanism and your abilities.

name: Cassette Five
description:
A collection of 8 games for the ZX81 with 16K memory expansion module.

Planetoids
A clone of the Arcade classic Asteroids.

Breakout
A clone of the Arcade classic Breakout.

Space Rescue
You have to rescue 6 astronauts on the ground by steering a dropship through an asteroid field towards landing platforms. After landing and picking up one astronout you have to fly up through a field of enemy ships and dock with the mother ship.

Draughts
Play draughts against a computer opponent.

Byte-man
A Pac-man clone with three different mazes to complete.

Dodgems
Like pac-man you must eat all the dots. Dodgems is however made up of lanes (from outside to inside) and you can switch lane on the left, right, top or down side of the screen while always moving forward.

Blitz
You fly over a city and you have to bomb the building to clear a path for landing. You can go up and down and drop bomb. Buildings are rebuild and get higher as time progresses, make sure not to crash into one.

Merchant
You are a sea trader sailing from city to city buing and selling items. While sailing from one city to another you can encounter danger which make you loose cargo. You can buy more ships. The goals is to reach a capital of 1000000 florins.

name: Unplugged
description: VR music game Unplugged lets you play air guitar and write rock history, fully powered by finger-tracking technology. No peripherals required, just you rocking out hard to some of the biggest and loudest songs by world-famous rock bands including The Offspring and many more to be announced.

name: Elerena
description: Elerena is a magic-based dungeon crawler that hosts a variety of magic and enemies. With currently 3 different schools of magic that offer unique and interesting playstyles, and more as the game thrives, there is a type of magic for everyone to enjoy as they rain down hell on the enemies they face.

name: Junkpunk: Arena
description: Junkpunk Arena is an arena combat game in which the player controls robots that they designed from various pieces of junk. The gameplay consists entirely of online competitive multiplayer in which the player's robots are pitted against each other.

name: Exvelten
description: Exvelten is a Free to play Tutorial of RPG Maker XP + first game of the Gzhapel Series. You are Cytheria or Zachiev; a lone traveler in a home tent. Explore four quadrants of different seasons. Spring Rain, Snow, Desert. Finally a Town to have a little Fun in! Exvelten is a sandbox learning game!

name: Witch's Reign
description: A survival-horror, 2D grid puzzle like game centered around finding the purpose of the Witch's deed. An Untold story of her reign is still lost in the dark, full of blood thirsty monsters lurking in the dark. Features a variety of levels, difficult for puzzle experts. Take your chance- Witch's Reign

name: The Cost of Recovery
description: What would you do if someone close to you suddenly went through major trauma? What sacrifices would you be willing to make to keep your family together? Experience the different perspectives and emotional journeys of four protagonists when their worlds are suddenly turned upside-down.

name: Light2Live
description: Light2live is a procedurally generated roguelike with crafting, stealth, exploration and asynchronous multiplayer mechanics. Improve your skills and discover secrets as you advance through the floors of this dangerous fortress in search of your missing friend. Stay in the light ...

name: Lightbox
description: A casual puzzle game about manipulating and playing with light.

name: Earth Marines
description: Earth Marines - a dynamic top down shooter in which you need to save the planet from dangerous zombie - brain eaters!

name: Uproar
description: Explore procedurally generated worlds, look for artifacts, fight enemies using any item, because everything around is your weapon. And all of this with friends!

name: Themes of Dark and Light
description: Themes of Dark and Light is a 2D puzzle platformer where changing the colour theme will alter the environment.

name: Keeper of the Labyrinth
description: A nonlinear interactive fiction game about identity and self-discovery. Decide your own path through the labyrinth's strange halls, and confront the terrors and mysteries within.

name: The Fear Island
description: The Fear Island is an online co-op survival horror game where players accidentally land on an island full of supernatural entities and need to find an escape vehicle and its necessary resources.

name: King Hajwala
description: king Hajwala Online is your chance to immerse yourself in the real world of drifting. Get together with friends, tune your car and burn some tires!

name: Avalon: Sacred Crusade
description: An online multiplayer dungeon crawling first-person experience. Limitless adventure awaits in the retro inspired realm of Avalon. Battle, trade, find secrets, cast spells and explore with your friends or alone, if you dare! What legends will you uncover within this long forgotten realm?

name: The Epic
description:
A plot-based Open World, Skill-Driven ARPG in the reinterpreted world of Russian fairy tales, telling the story of species segregation that turned into class and religious war.

The key mechanics of the game are centered around exploring the vast and dynamically changing world. The gameplay is based on an atypical isometric RPG combat system that makes each battle difficult, forcing you to look for an approach to a specific type of enemy.Opponents' blows are strong, and their behavior in battle requires learning and forming tactics or choosing another area for research.
The open world changes depending on the behavior of the player and the freedom of action allows you to play a role, without being tied to be good or bad.

name: Brass: Birmingham
description: Welcome to the Industrial Revolution! Lead your fast-growing business enterprise, build and develop new industries, multiply your income and don‚Äôt get distracted by your rivals. Show everyone you are the real deal!

name: Blimby
description: Jump, swing, and chew your way out as Blimby in this fun, cartoony, 2D platformer inspired by cartoons of the 90's!

name: Grandmother's Tale
description: Grandmother's Tale is a 2D adventure game about the fate of two teenagers, brother and sister. The game is set during the events of World War II

name: Teodoro and the Evil Machines
description: TEODORO 's home has been attacked by monsters who are stealing the VITAL ENERGY from his world to feed his evil machines with which they are going to steal from other worlds. Recover stolen VITAL ENERGY and restore balance to your world.

name: Paug
description: A fireball, spirits and a pyramid. What can happen? Move your racket and beat the spirit in a duel.

name: Fire Opal
description: A nice and relaxing puzzle game with over 400 levels of varying difficulty. Play with positive and negative tetris-like shapes to reach each level‚Äôs target. Challenge yourself to solve maps the fastest, or with the least amount of steps. And most of all, have fun!

name: Nuclear Blaze
description:
Nuclear Blaze is a 2D firefighting game from the creator of Dead Cells, with all the devastating backdrafts, exploding walls and sprinklers you could expect. Fight your way through a mysterious facility and try to keep the blaze under control.

As a trained firefighter, you're being air-dropped right in the middle of this hell blaze to investigate and look for survivors. But the unexpected presence of an unknown military facility might somewhat affect your plans.

Using only your fire hose and your skills, you try to clear all fires in each area. But that won't be an easy task: wildfire will spread around you, and even just opening a door might become a serious threat if not planned carefully.

But Nuclear Blaze isn't only about firefighting: the world is packed with secrets, story bits and... cats to save!

name: Academy of Magic: Dark Possession
description: Help Dennis and his friends in this magical match3 adventure against the dark forces of The Great Dark Wizard.

name: Deadly Broadcast
description: Camera is ready. Batteries are full. So let the broadcast begin! Deadly Broadcast is a co-op Horror game that can be played with 1-4 player. As a Live Broadcast phenomenon, your goal is to both survive and reach the maximum number of instant views by broadcasting in abandoned and dangerous places.

name: Samurai Shampoo
description: Melee-based roguelike dungeon crawler where a fallen samurai must retrieve his stolen Shampoo.

name: Humanity: First Woman In Space
description: Explore space, empathy, diversity. Feel how it is to be somebody else. Humanity transports you into the body of the first woman to go into space.

name: Destruction Time!
description: It's destruction time! Build, blow up, and destroy! In this world of realistic physics, you can smash castles with catapults, blow up buildings, shoot slingshots and throw objects, and watch buildings fall apart beautifully.

name: Ammo 666
description: Now it's your turn to survive! Kill various zombies that come in waves at you. Collect points by killing zombies to get new Weapons, Bullets and Health kits.

name: Death Becomes You
description: Death Becomes You is a whodunit mystery set in a magical school. You find your best friend dead, and four suspicious students lingering around the scene. Who is the one that did it? Who is lying about their intentions on that night?

name: Dead Box
description: Henry explores the depths of Purgatory to pass onto the other side after dying.

name: Chambers of Devious Design
description: Chambers of Devious Design is a tactical base building game, where you are tasked with designing an evil lair for an evil mastermind. But watch out! You are not the only one looking to gain favor with the boss. Come up with creative designs and sabotage your competitors!

name: HamsterVeRse
description: Get on your headset and get ready to enter...the HamsterVeRse!!! Take control of a ragtag group of hamsters and lead them on an adventure full of platforming action, mind-bending puzzles, deep customization, construction modes, and more!

name: Cross Numbers
description: A math based crossword style game.

name: Hexteria
description: Hexteria is a casual Turn-Based Strategy and Puzzle game. The concept is simple: each turn you rotate one tile on the hexagonal board, in order to take over your opponents' tiles. Play against your friends or the AI, or challenge yourself with the Single Player Campaign!

name: Unusual Findings
description: Unusual Findings: Three friends uncover mysteries in the 1980s. Follow their amazing adventures in a game where your decisions really matter. Be prepared to spin like a record on your incredible journey back to the era of synthesizers, VHS Rental stores, 8 bits games and evil alien conspiracies.

name: Die Like a Hero
description: Die Like a Hero is a rogue-lite with turn-based combat, where the best strategy is to attack at the right moment. Fight like a die or die like a hero!

name: Labirinto 3
description: Labirinto this is a simple game in which you need to get square to the other end of the maze.

name: Furious Revenge of Bolo
description: Find the answers to the main questions and learn the whole story of the lone Bolo.

name: At the Behest of the Pike: Time to Run
description: The stove can go if there are wheels and firewood!

name: Suit for Hire
description: Shoot and toss enemies around in this top-down arcade shooter, cause mayhem and fight using your gun-fu and martial arts to reach the best scores possible.

name: Narco Tycoon
description: Narco Tycoon is a simulation game about building a drug empire. Manage and develop your own drug factories. Employ the best people in the "industry" and invest in new technologies. Influence local politics, destroy your rivals or take over their business. Become the real Drug Lord!

name: Cold Hill
description: Cold Hill is a 2D pixel art action platformer game. Find your way through dozens of obstacles, jump precisely, fight enemies. Explore forest, caves and mountains. Help people from the forest and find out the truth about who the real enemy is.

name: Our Mind
description: Wake up in an abandoned laboratory not knowing how you ended up there. Explore the deserted hallways and try to find a way out. However, you are not alone. There is something else roaming around the halls.

name: Bartender Hustle
description: Craft divine refreshments for a flood of clientele while you hustle your way to the top as a bartender.

name: Seed of the Dead: Sweet Home
description: Slaughter the ghouls to save the girls! Build up your love nest and woo four heroines as you fight to survive a ruined zombie hellscape! A one-of-a-kind Post apocalyptic FPS dating sim game filled with intense zombie killing action and lusty romance!

name: Moon Defence
description: Stand still and fight for the Earthlings across the Solar System. Accumulate energy to repair, build and research. Reveal the unthinkable truth.

name: Barbarian Legend
description: Barbarian Legend is a big war like strategy simulation game. You will take on the role of a barbarian leader who will lead his army to conquer enemy territories, develop his own fiefdoms and unite the world by force and strategy.

name: New Home: Medieval Village
description: New Home: Medieval Village is a city building and management game. Build roads, zone house, trade and farming lands, and attract people to your village. Meet your villagers needs, educate them and zone more lands considering demands. Attract whealtier people and grow your village over time.

name: Blazing Aries
description: The game tells the story of a new adventurer named Aries. She visits all kinds of cities, travels around the unknown world, fights against the "Calamities" that spread all over the world. This game's core is the orthodox action fighting mode!

name: Flight Attendant Simulator
description: Travel the world as you progress through your career as a flight attendant while ensuring the safety and comfort of your passengers.

name: Soer Dolls
description: Soer Dolls is a horror adventure game in which you need to find enchanted dolls in order to save the small town of Lazyiville from the terrible curse that caused ghosts and monsters to appear in the city!

name: Place for Hero
description: A game in the genre of adventure, in which you have to look for a missing Sheep, simultaneously exploring the world and helping the inhabitants of a small forest village.

name: Star Apprentice: Magical Murder Mystery
description: Star Apprentice: Magical Murder Mystery is a danmaku-detective game that combines point-and-click style deduction with high octane bullet hell gameplay. Find evidence, interrogate suspects, and refute contradictions to solve the case!

name: Schmutznik
description:
A 2D, platforming game with a telescoping robot and short, intense caves to explore.

Use your robot Schmutznik to clean up slime in the underground realm. Reach higher platforms with your telescopic neck. Each of the 35 caves has a new mechanic or idea to experience. 99% of the art is made from colored clay.

name: City of Atlantis
description: The legendary City of Atlantis has emerged from underwater. This time you are in charge. Build, plan, upgrade and survive!

name: Miss Intelligence
description: ËÆøÂÆ¢ÊÇ®Â•ΩÔºå01ÂûãÂÜÖÂµåÂºèÂÖàËøõ‰∫íÂä®Â®±‰πêÁªüÂêà‰ΩìÊ≠£Âú®‰∏∫ÊÇ®ÊúçÂä°ÔºåÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•Âè´Êàë‚ÄúÊô∫Âßù‚Äù„ÄÇ

name: Espiocracy
description: Espiocracy is grand strategy game with unique take on the Cold War. Play as an intelligence service (CIA, KGB, Stasi, Mossad, and many more): launch proxy wars, stage coups, steal war plans, assassinate enemies, and tilt world history in your favor.

name: What's the Matter? VR
description: What's the Matter? is a chemistry fantasy experience that is based on unique atom and molecule chemistry crafting mechanics. Let your mind run wild in this fully interactable sandbox-like model world!

name: Fantasma
description: Fantasma is a Psychological Horror that puts players face-to-face with the supernatural. Alone or as a team- make contact with paranormal beings end escape with your life using a variety of specially designed equipment and techniques.

name: The Amethyst Stones
description: Zoe explores the intense origin story of her father to identity and find the clues and Amethyst stones to save her sister from a blood illness and survive the lost island from a young woman to a hardened survivor.

name: Go Rocket
description: An arcade game about a rocket flying in endless space.

name: Fiore I: Daffodil
description: Follow Solomon Knight, a new refrain agent. As he fights against Harbinger for his own sin. Will he overcome his sin‚Ä¶?

name: The Frosts: First Ones
description:
An adventure about searching for a missing hunter and meeting with alien beings!
Explore wild nature, follow the friend's trail, climb on a rock, lure out a boar, meet a wolf, survive in a rockfall. Heal a deer and trick a creature!
Meet the Unknown!

name: Yellow Ballman
description: Yellow Ballman is a high speed 2D action game where you control a ball-shaped character. Your goal is to reach the end while avoiding needles and other gimmicks.

name: Salt and Sails
description: Salt and Sails is a naval combat style game where you control a ship.

name: Idle Wasteland
description: Idle Wasteland is an Incremental Idle RPG in a post-apocalyptic world. Level up skills, refine your salvaged materials and hunt mutant creatures to survive!

name: Bunny Flush
description: Just go up, don't look down. You will be addicted to this platform game that will challenge you to the fullest.

name: Zeriliah Chronicles
description: Experience an epic adventure alongside Vairon the young intrepid warrior. The terrible Floubyhs decided to invite themselves to the village of Yatapah and kidnap someone. What is Vairon's goal in this whole story ? Save the kidnaped villager and return to enjoy his birthday in peace.

name: The Exclusion Zone Online
description: MMO First-person shooter with RPG elements. The usual laws do not apply here, there are no police and law enforcement agencies - so the zone attracts people who want to avoid justice. And various anomalies and their creations attract scientists, mercenaries, hungry for profit, and ordinary stalkers.

name: Lone McLonegan : A Western Adventure
description: Lone McLonegan is an old-school point-n-click adventure game inspired by old westerns with touches of acid humor. Help Lone become "The Greatest Outlaw In The Old West" as you tackle fun puzzles and meet quirky characters.

name: My name is human
description: My name is human - is a new 2D guest-clicker where you will have to do different quests playing like a robot.

name: Professional Soldier
description: Stand on guard of global safety, wage wars no one hears about, or start new ones. Once you have been a soldier. Choose between justice and money. Now you are a‚Ä¶ Professional Soldier.

name: Rhythm Knights
description: Rhythm Knights is a unique, musical rhythm game about a group of ragtag knights seeking vengeance on an evil king who destroyed their home. The king bear hired 8 evil monsters to stop you from seeking your revenge! Click the notes as they come down to take down your foes!

name: The Exomachinist
description: Explore a strange alien world in this real-time strategy/action game and fight the forces of the Exomachinist.

name: Kungfu Football Captain
description: Pixel style, violent football, class rouguelike, football manager.

name: Blood Field
description: Explore a sinister world with environments based on Vietnam culture and a storyline inspired by Vietnam myths and folklore.

name: Milli & Greg
description: Help Milli to find Greg in this challenging platform game.

name: Vandalhalla
description: Have fun in the online Fast FPS Vandalhalla ! Play in team to stomp on your opponents with more than fourty weapons and abilities, experience the Shifumi concept with a total freedom in your loadout, and interact with your surroundings !

name: MyHoriZen
description: MyHoriZen is a meditation aid that lets you create an environment you find comfortable. It features a variety of locations and music to help you find your zen. You can also add objects to each environment to further let you customize your experience.

name: Don't Stare
description: Don't Stare is a narrative stealth platformer about avoiding extroverts who want to talk to you! You play as the Introvert, trying your best to bring your friendship group back together after a party gone wrong shatters it. Jump, climb, slide, bounce and flip your way through a journey of mental health, setting boundaries, and finding that the overly friendly extroverts aren't actually mean, just different!

name: Lost Scavenger
description: How long could you survive in a parallel universe where the Mist dictates its rules? Would you be able to find the way to your homeworld, or will you adapt to live under the Mist domain? Fight for resources, get together with other survivors and discover the secrets of this world.

name: Star Pixie
description: It is a 2D spaceship war game. With our spaceship, we destroy enemies that come in waves.

name: Equin 2: The Warren Peace
description: When an evil wizard writes a 6000-page book to bore the townspeople to death, it's up to you to take the damn thing and return it FROM WHENCE IT CAME.

name: DokiToki: Time Slows Down When You're In Love
description: Manipulate, freeze, and unfreeze objects in 3D first person puzzles. Explore school, meet new friends, and enjoy an anime-style story as you clear each level. Solve each puzzle to confess your love in DokiToki: Time Slows Down When You're in Love!

name: Dungeons of Voidria
description: Discover synergistic skills, gather peculiar trinkets, and defeat enemies with a unique skill-queuing battle system as you explore and unearth secrets of the ever-changing Dungeons of Voidria.

name: Yuko and the Akuma Menace
description: Yuko and the Akuma Menace is a top-down, grid based movement, adventure maze game set in a ninja world of fantastic creatures and magic. Fight monsters with your kunai, shurikens and smoke bombs. Cross dangers using the magical orbs, and save the world from the greatest threat ever.

name: Code angel
description: In a distant future humanity found a new source of energy allowing them to break, the limit of science from this new discovery came challenges that changed the faced of mankind, computer viruses can now take physical form, and wreck havoc in cities that use the blue excsell , eliminate them all.

name: King 'n Knight
description: King ‚Äôn Knight is an arcade platform game that takes place in a medival fantasy world. Play solo or coop in this game inspired by Ghosts‚Äôn Goblins and Megaman.

name: Project Demigod
description: Project Demigod is the ultimate superhero simulator. Stage physics-driven comic book battles in a limitless sandbox. Toss cars into ninjas with super strength, swing through cityscapes or master tactile melee weapons. You decide what type of hero to be. Who will you become?

name: Tower of Guardian
description: Tower of Guardian , is 2D Fantasy Platformer RPG, tells about adventure of a wizard princess from Kingdom called "Aluria" exploring The Tower of Darkness

name: Homewords
description: Homewords is a hybrid visual novel / adventure game where you have to stop a child from insulting everyone. Discover planet Orbt√ºse and it's strange inhabitants in this RPG where combat is replaced by something way more challenging: preventing and solving conflict through conversation.

name: Murder Diaries
description: Figure out what happened, explore fascinating yet almost surreal landscapes and enjoy the thrilling storytelling. Collect pieces of the story while freely floating through related environments and immerse yourself into an intriguing story filled with blood and murder unlike you have ever seen before

name: Magical Valkyrie Lyristia
description: The evil organization Fakker has been terrorizing the residents of the city at night, abducting people left and right. One woman stands against them: Magical Valkyrie Frostia. One day, she saves another woman with the potential to transform and their fate may be changed forever...

name: Doki Doki First Love Club!
description: Confessing love to someone is one of the most intimidating challenges we face in our lives. Doki Doki First Love Club takes this relatable fear to the extreme. This visual novel isn't your average rom-com; it's a fight between two stubborn geniuses in a battle of who will confess first

name: Despair: Blood Curse
description: A third-person survival horror game featuring non-linear gameplay, puzzles, and enemies from the depths of hell. After the arrival of an unexpected guest back home, Anna's in a race against time to uncover the mystery of the events that took place. Will she save her sister before it's too late?

name: Tapeworm Disco Puzzle
description: A grid based puzzle game where you play as a tapeworm and help some fleas have a good time.

name: Turbo Tempest
description: A Multiplayer Speedboat Battle Arena where you fight to be the last boat standing using a range on weapons on the map.

name: Occult
description: Occult is an online co-op horror game, in which players will have to confront evil cultists, horrible monsters and ancient curses

name: Final Foe
description: Final Foe is an isometric action RPG that challenges you to battle treacherous enemies in a mysterious dungeon. Single player and co-op modes. Modifiers and boss rounds. Survive and fight to the end, until the final foe is killed!

name: Vacancy Unlimited
description: The dead fill the streets you grew up on. It's time to leave home in search for your father. Uncover the magical secrets of your family's past that will shape the apocalypse as you know it.

name: Maybe I Can
description: Welcome, we're putting you in the brain of Tyler Lee who wants to destroy the world. But it won't be easy. Tyler is going to get in a lot of trouble. Let's see if you can get Tyler Lee to achieve his goal.

name: Rift Adventure
description: Rift Adventure is a pixelart platform in a magical world full of adventures and with a functional tax system, it is up to the player, to walk beyond his own future as an adventurer, the future of the city's development.

name: The Absolutely Hilarious Cat Game
description: The Absolutely Hilarious Cat Game is exactly what you would expect it to be, the only thing is, things take a dark turn when you wake up in a place you shouldn't be... Wrong place wrong time I suppose... Watch out, Felines are on the prowl in Ginger's Peak. Get the job DONE, then GET OUT!

name: Escape War
description: Are you ready for escape adventure? Do you answer is ‚Äúyes‚Äù? Let‚Äôs go!

name: Mythos Party
description: Hack, slash, punch and slap your opponents for the glory of the gods and be rewarded with their divine power! Become a champion in Mythos Party, a free-to-play brawling party game set in a light-hearted mythological universe for up to 8 opponents.

name: Deep Rune
description: A side-scrolling adventure game that seamlessly blends RPG mechanics and puzzle solving, all set in a mysterious world rooted in Norse mythology. Inspired by games like Tower of the Sorcerer and DROD RPG.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
description:
This is a brand new izakaya simulation gameplay.
The young night sparrow and her BBQ has become a welcome sight in Gensokyo with her hard work and flourishing business-that is, until one day, that fateful enemy showed up whom broke her dream. Start from scratch, loaded with dept, it's all or nothing on today's cooking.

name: The Chronos Principle
description: The Chronos Principle is a breathtaking journey through a series of intricate puzzles that explore the concept of time manipulation.

name: Horror Royale
description: Horror Royale is a split-screen and online multiplayer psychological horror game that involves trying to escape a level as monsters try to hunt you down and kill you. With three different game modes and five different monsters, scream and cheer with your friends as you try to survive.

name: Suicide For Him
description: A mysterious and deep story with multiple endings.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Leviathan
description:
Earth is now ruled by dragons, the last humans live in underground shelters, is up to Europa, Sofia, Claire, and Virginia to defy the gods and save the world!

Discover the ending to the Calmed by the Dark saga in our most ambitious game to date, where everything is going to be decided.

name: Dog Eat Dog: Scam to Survive
description: Things are bad. Rent is late, again. There's no food, again. Your father-in-law needs medication, again. Life is relentless. In this ethically ambiguous title, it's time to set your morals aside, and do whatever it takes to survive. When all you have is nothing, you take from those who have it all.

name: Call of Myth
description: Call of Myth is a CCG that will take you to the dark universe of horrors created by H. P. Lovecraft. Find your own strategy, crush your foes with brute force or turn them insane. Take the side of the Unspeakable horrors or Defenders of humanity. Choose your own path!

name: When I reincarnate, I'm a cube!?
description: The world you've been reincarnated into is a cube!? This is a quest-style light FPS.

name: Junkman Simulator
description: Junkman Simulator, Build Your Junkyard! Repair Your Car and Start Exploring!

name: Parasomnia Verum
description: Parasomnia Verum is an atmospheric horror game about a recurring dream.

name: Steve's HardCore WorldTour
description: A Speedy 2.5D Shooter where you cruise around Earth fighting galactic terrorists using the power of pure insanity.

name: Rimebeard
description: Create, remove and push blocks of ice strategically to extinguish all flames in each level. Use various other elements like rocks, crates, pipes and more to your advantage.

name: Autobahn Police Simulator 3
description: Autobahn Police Simulator 3 lets you play as a rookie officer who just resumed their position after a serious car accident left them incapacitated for a while. Work diligently and take on missions to become a capable police officer and keep the autobahn safe.

name: The Elysian Field
description: A gorgeous 3rd person casual adventure game centred around a dying soldier wondering through the elysian field witnessing the final moments of those already gone before leaving his own final mark. Uncover memories and a final conversation before laying to rest.

name: Tokyo Rogue
description: Jump and swing across Tokyo rooftops in this parkour platformer!

name: Football Bus Battle 2021
description: Oh no‚Ä¶The rival team has stolen the Football Cup before the tournament even started! The teams have deprived you of the big win. It's up to you give chase, hunt down the thieves and claim victory for your nation! Score enough Soccer team busses to become the 2021 Football Bus Battle Champion!

name: Dead Survival
description:
Dead Survival is a tactical survival FPS, in a post-apocalyptic world!
In an Open World overrun by Zombies, Militias, you and over 300 online players will have to survive.

name: Senses: Midnight
description: SENSE/s: Midnight a 3d survival horror game inspired by Fatal Frame and Resident Evil, featuring TANK CONTROLS , FIXED CAMERA ANGLES, and LIMITED INVENTORY in order to capture the truest essence of classic survival horror titles. Developed by SUZAKU.

name: My Downtown
description: Help the Mayor breathe life into a sparkling new city! Play over 100 levels of match 3 bliss and build your own city!

name: Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance
description: Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance - a game about spectacular sword battles from the third person.

name: Heist Day
description: Heist Day is an action packed top down shooter game where strategy plays a vital role. Plan and execute heists as you work your way to the top.

name: Cheap Game 3
description: Cheap game 3 is simple roguelite where minigames plays the main role

name: Dragon's Wandering Tavern
description: Wander the ever-shifting forest as a Dragon Merchant in a Studio Ghibli-inspired, peaceful roguelite management game. Craft enchanted items, brew magical potions, cook delicious meals for your friends and assemble a family of cute and quirky creatures who will join you on your adventure.

name: RunnerDot
description: RunnerDot is a casual little game made to kill your time. Seriously. When you're feeling like doing nothing, fire up RunnerDot and enjoy! You play as a little dot, and you use your mouse to navigate. You avoid stuff coming at you, and you collect points. Survive the longest. Compete in leaderboards.

name: Gobot
description: Gobot is an intense endless platform survival game focused on dodging falling meteors, Lasers, destroying robots, all while collecting powerups and upgrading abilities to help you survive.

name: Abi and the soul
description: Abi is a girl who wakes up lost and without memory on a magical island, but finds a small celestial light that will accompany her in this wonderful adventure of love and friendship. She discovers the mystery of the island and recovers all your memories.

name: What Happens in Space
description: What Happens In Space is a multi-player survival game where players are assigned a role the 2 sides being, either crew or alien. The crew need to survive while they find the keys for the escape pod and escape.

name: May Blues
description: A so-called Tsum Tsum-like puzzle game. Let's connect and erase the substances in his brain that have been sick due to May disease and make him happy!

name: Fostering Apocalypse
description: The demon summoned to embark the second apocalypse is only a child, and a woman who has lost it all resolves to save her. A half-hour long narrative game with survival gameplay elements and two endings.

name: Welcome Back
description: You died! Reincarnate in 5 animals to prove GOD You are worthy of returning to the world in this spiritual adventure. A short, experimental and multi-genre game with 5 gameplay styles, each with its own unique mechanics.

name: Help Yourself
description: Solve action-packed FPS puzzles by cloning yourself and playing around with time! Help Yourself is a puzzle shooter where you must work together with yourself! Cleverly plan ahead and cooperate with your clones in a time loop.

name: Meteor Genocide
description: Our only goal in this 2D space game is to reach the highest score by avoiding the meteor obstacles on our way.

name: Treasure Hunter Simulator 2
description: Once you've found all the artifacts in part one, it's time to test yourself in the new, revolutionary high-quality, Treasure Hunter Simulator 2.

name: Neokaiju
description: NEOKAIJU is a fast-paced destructive platformer game where you play as an ever-evolving kaiju wreaking havoc on the city beneath you. Save the baby kaiju trapped in power cells scattered through the city, race to destroy as much as you can within the time limit, and level up to your ultimate form!

name: Trash is Fun
description: Trash is Fun is a coop moving lowpoly waste sorting and recycling simulator that is developed by teenagers from the studio Martian Teapots. The glaciers melted, because of this, a virus was released, which gave the mind to animals. After they decided to sort and recycle trash.

name: Swoon!
description: Swoon! is an Adventure 2.5 Platformer for all ages. You are an alien who crashed on planet Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship, face the most daring bosses, travel through time and save your friends.

name: Star Chef 2: Cooking Game
description: Welcome to the most loved restaurant management game. Join millions in cooking, serving, managing, and trading. Meet chefs around the world and cater to celebrations. Form your CHEF TEAM to combat time management challenges and become the MASTER CHEF.

name: RhythmSlinger
description: Shoot with style to YOUR songs! RhythmSlinger is a kinetic trick-based VR rhythm shooter that generates fast-paced levels from any audio track.

name: OmegaBot
description: A tight action side-scroller with challenging robotic bosses. Dodge metallic dangers, acquire powerful weapons and blast your way through a destroyed world full of deadly machines where running out of energy means defeat.

name: Super Onion Boy 2
description: Super Onion Boy 2 is a 2D adventure game in retro style platformer. Defeat enemies on the way with the help of superpowers and epic transformations, collect coins and stars to earn extra lives, find chests with magic potions and defeat all the terrible bosses until you reach the final boss.

name: Help Me!
description: Become a psychiatrist, talk, counsel, and treat patients. Depending on your choices, the mini games and dialogues will change. Hurry up. Help Me! patients are waiting.

name: Game For Anna
description: Hello Anna. I made a game for you. We can play together as we used to.

name: Evil
description: You are a priest who has gone into the dark forest for a final battle against evil.

name: Coastline Flight Simulator
description: Fly with your planes through the huge open world! Transport goods, trade and complete recon missions. Discover all settlements in the coastal landscape, the islands and the desert. Upgrade your planes and paint them in the colors of your choice!

name: Submarine War
description: Submarine War is a new action-packed submarine combat game that immerses players in the 3D action with unique game controls and 3D environments.

name: Whisper Trip
description: Whisper Trip is a fast-paced side-scrolling co-op action game with cyberpunk elements. You are a new employee of the TPF (Tactical Police Force), a unit dedicated to the prevention of terrorist activities and the destruction of criminal groups...

name: Dunnigan's Trail
description: You're a merchant looking to strike it rich. Lead a wagon of hired swords on a trail of danger and hijinks that's a different experience every time. Defend your wares in turn-based tactical battles in this choose your own adventure fantasy roguelite. Make decisions, manage resources, and survive!

name: The Durka: You will (not) die
description: The main character - Mickey, returns to his hometown by the end of the holidays. As soon as he arrived at the station, he was met there not only by friends, but also by his father, who decided to hire him to work for him. When he got home, Mickey noticed something sitting in his closet - a guy in a black suit, mask and holding out a pineapple in his hand. He said he would help, but in what way? Suddenly, the city is being attacked by giant robots of an unknown corporation! Not time, make a decision!

name: Dogs Organized Neatly
description: In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange lovely doggos in a way that fits the grid. Dogs Organized Neatly comes with 80 different hand-crafted levels and a whole bunch of dogs in all shapes and sizes.

name: Plague Masters
description: Plague Masters is a 2d online fantasy RPG centered around the Bubonic plague. Plague Masters Is jam packed with story telling & lore, events and more. Train on mystical creatures, plague carriers and the undead. Follow the Epic quest line from safe city's to infected towns and dangerous pvp areas.

name: LumberQwaxes
description: Chop to it!! It's time to get your girl back. You play as Qwackeric in this side-scrolling action adventure. Play through ten lumbering stages. Left and right keys move and up arrow to jump, space to attack and escape to pause the game. Our Hero Heads to Start his new life as a LumberQwaxes!!

name: Magic Summoning Adventure
description: A strategy and adventure game Use the A and D keys of the keyboard to control the movement of the character, and use the mouse to fire bullets

name: Tiny Combat Arena
description: Tiny Combat Arena is an approachable combat flight simulator sporting a stylized look and various game modes. Dogfight your way in the Arena and in Quick Action or craft your own scenarios and take part in a vast war with objectives and friendly armies to support.

name: xTypeVersus
description: xTypeVersus is a typing game where players will face their aptitude to type fast, accurate but also to adapt to the situation. Play solo or versus other players.

name: The Play's the Thing
description: Win fame as a playwright before dark forces bring the curtain down for good! In a city stalked by a deadly curse, how will the power of your pen change the world?

name: Red and White
description: Restore color to a vast, empty world. An abstract puzzle metroidvania game focused on exploration.

name: Vanilla Inspector
description: This is an inspection! Take your clothes off and stay calm!

name: Amazething
description: Trap filled mazes with an ever growing difficulty await to test your skills. Please be advised that this mixture of maze-running and relaxing beats might still cause your controller to get stuck in your screen.

name: Star Vortex
description: Star Vortex is a casual game where you gather stars, avoid the asteroids and try to set a high score.

name: Sundowner
description: You are placed on a small island with the goal of not dying. Work on your base, upgrade your tools, and create weapons to ensure your dominance against a small server of other survivors.

name: Journey On
description: Experience a world of life and death in this exploration focused, anime style JRPG. Will you choose the path of light, or of darkness?

name: Last Night of Winter
description: A souls-like action-RPG with lots of battles and exploration. Defeat your enemies, steal their weapons, and uncover the secret of the stronghold.

name: City of Thugs
description: City of Thugs is a turn-based roguelite RPG, set in the modern world, where you'll have to fight your way through a city full of randomly generated thugs.

name: Castle Formers
description: A little game about defending your castle from night attacks of the skull masked troops and creatures. Collect coins, interact with the elements of the game, discover, explore, learn and survive for 30 days.

name: È≠îÁâ©Ë∞ÉÊü•ËÄÖ
description: No krypton gold! Leisure nourishes the liver! A sincere idle RPG! Become an aspiring young man (what the hell) who dreams of investigating monsters all over the world and travels all over the continent alone!

name: Goldenjar Fall
description: An ARPG game, intensely full of fantasy

name: The Great Menace
description: The Great Menace is an 'The war of the Worlds 1938' fictional aftermath as an 2D RTS game, after the fake radio drama in 1938, an alien force commences an invasion on Earth the following day, the 5 great powers: USA, Britain, Germany, Japan and USSR must endure the invasion force

name: Pogo-Rocket
description: Pogo sticks and Rockets, how could it go wrong? In this space-themed 2D platformer, you control an experimental rocket ship and must stop aliens from taking the Earth's resources. Play through a variety of levels with dangerous obstacles and save the world!

name: Nictheroy
description: Explore countless lands, gather vital resources, and build your base. Within this universe, you the player have the free will to decide where to go and what adventures you pursue. Secret storylines, unexpected events, and special interactions will create a journey unique to each explorer.

name: Embraced by Autumn
description: A sweet romance story with four heroines set in an all-girls‚Äô boarding school in France in 1896, featuring a crossdressing male protagonist.

name: Kingdom of the Untitled Magic
description: Get on a magical adventure full of mysteries and dangers! Become a glorified hero and free the kingdom from the awakened ancient evil while forging your unique path through the open world, using magic, diplomacy, or brute force.

name: Dungeon Brawlers
description: Dungeon Brawlers is a local multiplayer PvP battle game where you battle your friends to become the King of the Dungeon. Battle it out with swords, hammers, lasers, spears, and the power of current dungeon king: The Cyclops.

name: Hookah Cafe Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to know what is it like running your own Hookah Cafe Business? Let's Simulate It. Upgrade your shop with new types of equipment to attract and impress more customers.

name: Kardboard Kings: Card Shop Simulator
description: Open your own Card shop by the seaside in Kardboard Kings: Card Shop Simulator! Buy, trade and sell Cards, or keep them for your own collection. Earn reputation with customers, beat your shop goals, unlock new decorations, and host exciting events to bring everyone to the best Card shop in town!

name: Beldamos Miner
description: Beldamos Miner is a mining game, where you hunt for ore, buy upgrades, and explore. It starts out in a simple world that has an air of familiarity but as you progress in the game, you'll find a more complex and interesting world unfolds. Mine ore, learn spells, buy upgrades, and finish quests!

name: Road to Hollow Hills
description: Road To Hollow Hills is an adventure horror game. Explore the environment, collect useful resources, and customize the abilities of your character in order to survive the Road to Hollow Hills.

name: The Crackpet Show
description: The Crackpet Show is an action-packed rogue-lite shoot-'em-up about mutated animals that fight in a bizarre TV show, crushing their opponents with a variety of weapons. Choose your beastie, gear 'em up, and go kill your enemies in the name of fame and sweet sponsorship deals!

name: Midsummer Madness
description: Midsummer Madness is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Philana and the Elixir of Life
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Philana is on a journey to find the final ingredients for the Elixir of Life, the only medicine that can save her friend's life.

name: Dragon Bridge
description: Choose a character and do battle in Dragon Bridge, a quick, yet surprisingly deep two player card game.

name: Hellslave
description: Prevent demon‚Äôs horde from unleashing hell on this world in this dark fantasy Dungeon Crawler. Fight fire with fire, make a deal with the Devil and choose which demon to worship.

name: Toys 'n' Traps
description: Protect Toy's Town in this action-filled tower defense. Build crazy traps, shoot enemies, lead your own minion army, obtain new traps and upgrade them to defend your car base across 4 different environments with visuals inspired in toys.

name: Bamse i Egypten
description: Childrens puzzle and minigame collection from 2007.

name: Monster Outbreak
description: Monster Outbreak is a 2D pixel game, where you will need to survive waves of monsters coming from every direction. Enchant your weapons, build your base, and see how long you and your team can survive!!!

name: Dragon's Vengeance
description: Lead an elite group of heroes as they begin a treacherous journey to stop an exiled genius from becoming a tyrant, ruling a world filled with monsters and magic!

name: Smuggler Simulator
description: Life at the border crossing is like a lottery - I never know what the next day will bring. People want to move all kinds of goods, and I help them. I love this job.

name: Parkour Posse
description: A cooperative platformer where you race through an obstacle course, relay style!

name: Viking Berserker
description: In the Old Norse written corpus, ‚ÄúBerserkers‚Äù were those who were said to have fought in a trance-like fury. Now, it's time for you to become one of them - to be a great Viking warrior, you need to learn how to be a Berserker.

name: OrbWars
description: OrbWars is a fast paced, action oriented party game featuring easy to learn high intensity gameplay. Featuring seamless local and online multiplayer, there's nothing to stop you from fighting with or versus your friends in up to 4 player matches or experiencing the cooperative story campaign.

name: HorrorDriven: A story for the road
description: HorrorDriven: A story for the road takes survival horror into new territories. Explore, survive and solve mysteries in procedurally generated open world environments. Travel the road and scavenge for resources in abandoned locations while avoiding the dangers of an unforgiving and dynamic world.

name: Death Realm
description: Once you enter the Death Realm, you are bound to abandon hope. Do you think you can take on the most powerful?

name: Heck Deck
description: Heck Deck is a bullet hell card game where all the bullets are cards and time only progresses as you move. Explore 5 stages full of unique enemies and bosses, discover dozens of cards, and visit shops to buy and sell cards for health!

name: Grey Lucidity
description: Grey Lucidity is a visual novel, scary, adventure horror game about surviving from the cursed town. Escape for your life! But, do remember that you're not only one here.

name: Archquest
description: Archquest is a classic CRPG that mixes a retro aesthetic, immersive first-person exploration, and tactical turn-based third-person combat based on tabletop RPG rules. Inspired by AD&D Gold Box games such as Pool of Radiance.

name: Drone Gladiator
description: New era of gladiator battle shows has come, era of robots! And you have a chance to participate in it! Drone Gladiator is an arena shooter, where you upgrade your drone, fight giant bosses and participate in random events.

name: Night Dreamer
description: Night Dreamer is a single player, side scrolling action game. Make your way across the many different types of blocks while also battling off enemies as you head towards the goal. However, to reach said goal you need to touch special objects in a specific order to receive the key that will open the door to your goal.

name: Laundry Simulator
description: A point-and-click time-management game where cats rule. Manage your hectic laundromat and get your cat through law school to defeat Laundrocorp.

name: ÊòéÊú´ËæπÂÜõ
description: This is a silhouette style killing strategy game, players will lead the Ming army in the 17th century to complete the unfinished mission of the Ming Empire! Defeat the Nuzhen tribe, suppress the internal rebels, travel to the new world of America and start an epic war with the European empire!

name: Red Crucible: Able Archer
description: Tabletop real-time RTS strategy war game.

name: Home Office
description: You work from home, take care of pets, plant vegetables and travel, living your life.

name: Misery Street
description: Join Emo on his adventure through a dark and treacherous world to find the meaning of his life...

name: Dash Lamb
description: Dash lamb is a single-screen platformer. Dash to avoid the darkness below, your fire is our ruin...our salvation.

name: Shutter Heist
description: Shutter Heist is an 8-bit Crime Adventure, with a focus on quick moving, quick thinking, and legally debatable puzzles!

name: Anopek
description: Venture into an ancient tomb on a distant, forgotten planet. Explore the relics of the past, and face the trials of the gods in this retro first-person shooter action/adventure mashup.

name: Nyctophobia: Devil Unleashed
description: A single-player pyschological horror game that will take you to the deepest and darkest secrets of the asylum.

name: Glutton
description: Glutton - a game that tells us about a creature brought to earth on a meteorite. The game begins with the level of atoms, our creature as it grows acquires new skills for more effective absorption of biomass, and protection from the dangers that wait for it at every step.

name: Custodian: Beginning of the End
description: Custodian: Beginning of the End is a brutal and difficult platformer designed for caution and reaction. Explore, seek secrets and collect mechanisms to become even stronger and meet the impending End!

name: The Shepherd
description: After finding an old picture of your grandfather on a camel, you decide to leave the city and set off into the serenity of the desert. In order to become a great rider, just like he was. Train your herd, befriend desert-folk, fight predators, and navigate the mysteries of the desert.

name: Medieval Machines Builder
description: Acquire plans, gather resources and create the most destructive device in history in Medieval Machines Builder! Become the greatest inventor in the whole world!

name: Alpaca Stacka
description: A 3D adventure platformer where you play as a kind alpaca dedicated to helping their animal friends.

name: Star Chaser in Sea World
description: Shoot all stars with one shot!

name: Terra Ventura
description: Terra Ventura is an isometric action-adventure RPG set in a fantasy world, where you find yourself alone, shipwrecked and crew missing. Select and develop your character and immerse yourself in an adventure.

name: Lucidus Mortem
description: In the 1930's, Samuel, a man with occult beliefs is contacted by S. Stenfield, an elderly man desperate for the suicide of Alice, his daughter. Through a voodoo ritual, Samuel enters a world that only the dead can access. There he will try to recover Alice's soul... But nothing is what it seems.

name: Artist Life Simulator
description:
Live the life of (a starving) artist in 19th century alternative history.
Collect and combine feelings, memories, ideas and inspirations, fight with depression, addiction or madness and other mental phenomenon.
Paint masterpieces, sell them for riches (or scraps) and explore the city of Nova Oportunia. A unique card-based roguelite with 18 alternative endings.

name: Witching Hour
description: Witching Hour is a horror story that takes you out of your family home and across the quiet town of Hollow Hills. Your fate depends on making difficult choices, your relationship with your family, and confrontations with the matriarch of the town‚Äôs affliction with witchcraft, Lucilia.

name: Dream's Reach: Village of the Gods
description: A 1-4 player Co-op Action-Adventure RPG with worlds inspired by ancient mythology. Explore a hand crafted overworld and procedurally generated dungeons or make your own to share with friends with our Puzzle/Dungeon Builder.

name: Cave Guessers
description: Cave Guessers is a casual word guessing game for 2-16 players. Every turn, one player gets a word. They then describe that word using abstract concepts, while the other players guess what the word could be! The faster someone guesses a word, the more points are rewarded!

name: Tiny Hunter
description: Tiny Hunter is a technical 2D platformer oriented speedrun. You play as an antivirus that has for objective the cleaning of more than 100 files corrupted by a panoply of bugs and viruses. Analyze each file by judiciously combining jump, sprint, shoot and more.

name: Hoverboard Chase
description: HoverBoard Chase - 3d hoverboard race where you have to dodge cops, earn influence points for tricks and monitor your character's health bar, because in the end you can get caught!

name: The Wolf's Den
description: The Wolf's Den is a suspenseful first person experience through a dark atmospheric mountain. Explore a mysterious train tunnel on your way to escape from a tragic accident that destroyed you and your partner's lab and uncover the truth behind the mysteries that surround you. Enter The Wolf's Den!

name: Cyber Cult City
description: Cyber Cult City is a hoverboarding and hacking Cyberpunk roguelike focused on hit and run tactics.

name: A Wave of Enemies
description: A Wave of Enemies is an FPS game where the goal is to defend against hordes of monsters. There are 3 types of enemies in the game. With each wave, the speed and number of enemies increases. Use a machine gun to kill enemies. Break your previous record.

name: Car Physics Simulator
description: Car Physics Simulator, Drive Realistic Cars and Test Physics!

name: A Night In Kyosaka
description: A young 10-year-old who wanders into a world ruled by dogs, cats, warlocks, and spirits in search of their missing puppy.

name: Martin Goes on the Attack
description: Martin is an advanced robot controlled from the main computer, you have to take control of a strong and fast robot soldier.

name: Manual Intervention VR
description: A real-time, sci-fi planetary defence VR game, where the core game mechanic is to orbit around 3D planets and defend the ground colonies by destroying the incoming bombs. Unlock weapons and tools to gain a strategic advantage.

name: Unwanted visitors
description: Fight on hostile planets together with your friends. Get as far as possible while under attack of enemy waves and bosses. Increase your chance to survive by collecting bonuses. Every attack will make you stronger. But don't forget you have just one chance.

name: Roasting Report: A Narcotics Murder
description:
Detective Lee Kang-wool, who writes mystery during the day and novels at night. Then a female college student came to him.
Called a master of chemical engineering, she asks to find out who killed her beloved junior.
The suspects she brought in, however, reveal that there is another suspect.

name: The List
description: A young man is interviewed by the police only to turn up dead a week later. 3 years have passed, a special agent from Santa Fe navigates the police database in order to solve the mystery.

name: Dabado Puzzles
description: Puzzle game with adventure/exploration elements, where you place blocks, build constructions and collect score items, signs, buttons and many other goodies. Out of the box thinking and acting guarantee game progress and helps you revealing many hidden features and bonuses.

name: The Fermi Paradox
description: The Fermi Paradox is a choice-driven sci-fi narrative strategy game in which your decisions in one corner of the galaxy can upend entire civilizations in another. Guide species through millennia and help them explore the vastness of space, make contact and, perhaps, create harmony.

name: Thumb Fighter
description: These Thumbs are hungry for battle. You in?

name: Nothing to be done
description: In this adventure game you explore a sombre world of two people who no longer believe that future holds any change. Spend some time with them to discover if their fears are also yours.

name: Jaahg: The Crows Cry
description: A nostalgic arcade horror mystery game where you collect clues as you run from an unknown entity.

name: Rescue Teddy
description: Rescue teddy is a single player platform game where you step into the feet of Timmy, a boy who must recover his Teddy bear from the nightmares, but he will not be alone, Twine will accompany you on your adventure, allowing you to alternate between this world of nightmares and dreams.

name: Baseball Adventure
description: Baseball Adventure is a 2d game designed for the speed and reaction of the player, each blow must be calculated and hit in time, watch the moving objects around and have time to pull out the glove to catch the ball.

name: Hellbreath
description: Inspired on an old MMORPG, hellbreath will introduce you in the constant war between Aresden, the followers of the god Aresien, and Elvine, the followers of the god Eldeniel. Join the battle!

name: Paint Drying Simulator
description: This is literally a game about watch paint drying for 6 hours, so.. ..do you feel like wasting money and time? XD

name: Operation: Pinkeye
description: Operation: Pinkeye is a throwback first-person shooter set in an alternate Universe where the Acts of Union in 1707 never happened. Scotland and England remain independent and tensions between the 2 remain very high.

name: Mark Out! The Wrestling Card Game
description: COLLECT, CRAFT, and BATTLE your way to the top in this wrestling move collectible card game that lets you innovate like never before. Enter the ring a rookie...leave as the GOAT!

name: Walk of Shame
description: Escape without getting caught by your one-night stand's husband!! An indie pixel art game.

name: Forgotten Journey
description: Forgotten Journey is a puzzle oriented platformer, where the player will follow a linear path jumping, climbing and solving puzzles with the help of an AI companion that will follow her.

name: Payback time
description: Payback time pays homage to retro side-scrolling beat 'em ups, with its old-school graphics and music. A dangerous and powerful crime syndicate has taken over the city and the citizens need your help.

name: ÊòÜ‰ªë
description: "Kunlun" is developed using the Unreal 4 engine. This series tells about the future war between humans and artificial intelligence aggregates and multi-alien races from extragalactic galaxies. The game builds a brand new sci-fi world from a unique perspective. Players will play an interstellar ranger in the world of "Kunlun", and use the unique interactive system to take risks in the vast sci-fi world with their partners.

name: FrankenStorm TD: Prologue
description: Roguelite TD: all towers & enemies start the same, but you have 1 choice per wave affecting BOTH and stacking up for dramatic variance. Gradually salvage and make some choices permanent to build deeper strategies. Also a unique mazing challenge where wires and towers must be linked to a power source

name: Squad of Dangerous
description: War is going on. Go on 2d action missions, collect resources, cooperate with friends, send supplies to the frontline and watch the global war progress on the world map. Together, we'll get back our homeland!

name: Venaitura
description: A retro RPG wherein you assemble a party of 4 Heroes from 12 Classes and embark on a journey to rid the world of Tsufana from the titular tower's corruption.

name: Vainly
description: Vainly is a minimalist and story-driven platformer that subverts some of the common expectations from games by blending gameplay with the philosophy of Absurdism.

name: Red Man
description: A small city deprived of any freedom of thought under a dictator's rule, spread the seed of resistance and free people from oppression!

name: Frame Game
description: Grab some of your friends, a mouse or a tablet pen and make .GIFs together! Test your own .GIF making abilities in the gif-maker or create a lobby and have up to 10 people take turns drawing frames in each other's animations! Create amazing masterpieces of beauty or horribly funny abominations!

name: Daycare Manager
description: Take care of children, tend to their needs, solve daily challenges, expand and grow your business. Keep the children happy, healthy and educated to become the most prestigious daycare center in the city... Country... World!

name: Dark Shot
description: Inch your way through oppressive darkness using only a flashlight and 6th sense in this tense top-down roguelike. Shoot, stun, electrocute, poison and blow-up monsters in abandoned corporate offices where resources are scarce and even the furniture could be trying to kill you.

name: Norega
description: Norega is a game where you play as Kurt, a Knight in training, and your task is to feed up Kurt's stats so that he can improve in Strength and be able to defeat the tougher monsters found on the outskirts of Norega.

name: Atoll
description: The earth has been struck by an extinction level meteor, eliminating most of humanity. Survive by managing resources beneath the ocean surface in a single-person submarine craft. Test your survival skills to see if you can once again reach the ocean surface and uncover the fate of the earth!

name: Tricks Magician
description: Tricks Magician is a game about a magician who has been trapped in an alternate reality because of his assistant rabbit's revenge, and now must overcome several challenges with a defying gravity and return to your normal world.

name: Granduck
description: Help blind grandpa find his bed by throwing quacking ducks. Be careful, he is paranoiac, and his house is full of deadly traps!

name: Hentai Brick Breaker
description: Unlock beautiful hentai girls hidden behind bricks that you must break. Choose your girls and level from the gallery.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle Summer
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring summer sexy scenes on the beach by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Vampire Slave: A Yaoi Visual Novel
description: The world's most ancient vampire, a young and unprepared new leader of a centuries old vampire-hunting organization, thrust together by fate. Thalos knows he's found his beloved, but Dusty must never let himself grow close to a vampire.

name: Uplifted
description: Uplifted is an extremely fast paced first person shooter with an emphasis on movement and melee combat but featuring a selection of guns as well. You play as an uplifted or intelligent Cheetah, augmented with bionics, who has to fight for survival in the world that he does not understand.

name: Space Drone: Rescue Mission
description: Space drone is a minimal puzzle game with grid movement where you remotely control a drone to find and rescue your lost mates in space. Be aware to don't be without energy!

name: Wild Journey
description: Wild Journey is a mature arcade game with dating elements. Experience 3 stages of the relationship: Flirt, Desire and Love. Get to know all the 7 sisters before you become their lover. Unlock 63 various dialogues with English and Japanese voice-over and play unlimited number of bouncing ball levels!

name: Mumbai Gullies
description: Come and experience a thrilling and exciting story based in Mumbai, the city of dreams!

name: Furry House
description: The protagonist of a furry house is a boy forced by some events to move in with his mother. Making things difficult is that the mother and sisters are of another species, not human beings but furry!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XII: Timeless Adventure
description: Help Hercules repair the clock he broke trying to turn back time, defeat Chronos and save the world from catastrophe!

name: Depersonated
description: An interactive steampunk-inspired adventure filled with a noir atmosphere. –°hoose your path as a young girl named Molly and unravel the mysteries of RainWood town.

name: The Little Black Bestiary: The Salted Cookies of Carthaginia
description: A modern fantasy slice-of-life visual novel about what it's like to have a retired world-conquering lich queen for a girlfriend where you get to make inconsequential decisions about how you spend your afternoon together.

name: Love and Enchants
description: A casual puzzle lewd game about magic, girls and the power within. Using your free hand to enchant weapons for customers and the other hand for the...more important stuff.

name: The Teleport
description: The Teleport is a horror game where we try to protect ourselves from creatures through cameras.

name: BloodType
description: BloodType is a "Type'em Up," word-based, wave survival game. You must form words from randomly generated word scrambles to defeat your opponents. Test your vocabulary knowledge through 30 different stages all while under the pressure of advancing enemies.

name: Harvest Hero Origins
description: A wave defense game in classic arcade style.

name: Subject 95
description: Be a lab rat and escape multiple levels!

name: Goosen't: Run or Die
description: Help Duk, a goose wizard cursed to run endlessly or else perish, break the hex placed upon him by a demon in this fast-paced 2D platformer.

name: Super Techpack
description: A charming platformer ripped straight from the arcades. Run, shoot, climb and chomp your way to victory.

name: Knight Slave: The Dark Valkyrie of Depravity
description: This game is a Dark Fantasy RPG featuring an eye-eyed girl who slashes through anyone and anything that stands in her way.

description: In this game, you can experience the classic legendary play of fighting monsters and grabbing equipment and fighting for the world, as well as the super cool hero system, the combo system and the continuous technique system, which greatly enhances the fun of the game.

name: The Patcher
description: Feel the full-scale tactical multi-player action game on VR! Play strategic multi-play battles in PvP and PvE at the same time!

name: The Tower
description:
The Tower is an action-packed first-person shooter created by a single developer. It mixes tense combat, challenging puzzles, and a constantly unfolding story.
It's your first day as a security guard for one of the most secure buildings in the city. But your first day becomes your worst day when an explosion rocks the building, blocking stairwells and disabling elevators.

name: Prince of Persia: The Dagger of Time
description: Prince of Persia: The Dagger Of Time is a Virtual Reality Escape Game set in the world of Prince of Persia Sands Trilogy (Sands of Time, Warrior Within, The Two Thrones).

name: Charming Girls
description: Relaxing puzzle game with charming girls

name: Golfie
description: Golfie is a run-based, roguelike minigolf deck builder. Play through procedurally-generated levels, build a deck of crazy card abilities, and try to beat all 18 holes. Pick your route carefully because no two runs ‚Äì or shots ‚Äì are the same!

name: Dungeon Tactics
description: A retro style party based RPG smashing together concepts from several of my favorite games! Build a party of 6 characters combining active, passive, and reactive skills from 40 different classes.

name: The Harem Life of the Violent Swordsman!

description: Let's get out of the way!Pudding's Little Adventures to Create a Girlfriend!If you're desperate, the universe will help you...Pudding went on an adventure to Create a girlfriend.Will be able to make a girlfriend successfully?First, let's get our hands on the energy of the universe!

name: Sausage Man
description: Parachute into the battlefield and fight with other players in competitive, lighthearted battle royale action in Sausage Man! You can play Sausage Man anytime, anywhere. Using highly customizable sausage characters, swaying your weapons, team up with your friends to become the ‚ÄúKing of the Party‚Äù.

name: Los Cops
description: Become a detective in a multi-genre non-linear TV series. Uncover mystery secrets using acting and hot temper. Choose who will be your friend or foe - do everything you can to restore order in Los Angeles.

name: Runo
